alert.note: Alert for Lee (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued August 03 at 3:31AM EDT until further notice by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Advisory is extended for the following rivers in Kentucky... Kentucky River at Heidelberg affecting Lee County. ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...Kentucky River at Heidelberg. * WHEN...Until early this afternoon. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 2:45 AM EDT Wednesday the stage was 16.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below 16 feet by late this morning or early this afternoon. - Action stage is 16.0 feet. - Flood stage is 20.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Stay tuned to further developments by listening to your local radio, television, or NOAA Weather Radio for further information. The next statement will be issued by 10 AM Wednesday August 3rd.
